mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replys(bnum,rpnum,replyText,replyer) VALUES (#{bnum},IFNULL( (SELECT * FROM (SELECT MAX(rpnum)+1 FROM replys WHERE bnum=#{bnum} ) NEXT ), 1 ) ,#{replyText},#{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM replys WHERE bnum = #{bnum} ORDER BY rpnum desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replys(bnum,rpnum,rnum,replyText,replyer) VALUES (#{bnum}, #{rpnum}, IFNULL( ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT MAX(rnum)+1 FROM replys WHERE bnum = #{bnum} AND rpnum =#{rpnum} ) NEXT ), 1),#{replyText},#{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT bnum, COUNT(*) AS 'bnumCnt' FROM replys GROUP BY bnum
